      <p></p>
      <p></p>
      <br>
      <br>
      <p><c><script type="text/javascript"><!--
google_ad_client = "pub-7391409078036416";
google_alternate_ad_url = "http://www.entertainmentjobs.com/images/ejbanner.gif";

//--></script>
<script type="text/javascript"
  src="http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/show_ads.js">
</script></c><p>

      <br>
      <br>
      <table width="100%" border="0" align="center" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
        <tr>
          <td width="11"><!--webbot CLIENTSIDE bot="Ws4FpEx" MODULEID="'EEJ.COM (Project)\index_parahead_left.xws'" PREVIEW="<img src='index_files/index_parahead_left.gif' editor='Webstyle4' border='0'>" startspan  --><img src="index_files/index_parahead_left.gif" editor="Webstyle4" border="0" /><!--webbot bot="Ws4FpEx" endspan  --></td>
          <td class="parabg">
            <p align="center"><font face="Arial,Helvetica sans-serif" size="2">About
            This Site</font></p>
          </td>
          <td width="11"><!--webbot CLIENTSIDE bot="Ws4FpEx" MODULEID="'EEJ.COM (Project)\index_parahead_right.xws'" PREVIEW="<img src='index_files/index_parahead_right.gif' editor='Webstyle4' border='0'>" startspan  --><img src="index_files/index_parahead_right.gif" editor="Webstyle4" border="0" /><!--webbot bot="Ws4FpEx" endspan  --></td>
        </tr>
      </table>
      <p>&nbsp;</p>
      <p align="left"><font size="2" face="Arial,Helvetica Sans-serif">Our
      mission is to help individuals at all levels from the most inexperienced
      intern to the most expert senior executive find work and advance in their
      careers in the entertainment industry.&nbsp;<br>
 &nbsp;</font></p>
      <p align="left"><font size="2" face="Arial,Helvetica Sans-serif">In
      addition to jobs and internships from some of the top employers in the
      business, we provide editorial targeted to job search in film, television,
      radio, cable and in those businesses that support the industry (i.e.,
      advertising, marketing, finance, graphic arts, etc.). From comprehensive
      how to find work articles targeted to specific functions (production
      assistant, marketing, sales, news, hosting, etc.), to notices on upcoming
      competitions (screen play contests, film festivals, fellowships, etc.), to
      an up to date calendar of industry events, we seek to provide relevant
      information to help job seekers find work and advance in their careers in
      the industry.&nbsp;</font></p>
      <p align="left">&nbsp;</p>
      <p align="left"><font size="2" face="Arial,Helvetica Sans-serif">Since&nbsp;1992,
      thousands and thousands of job seekers from recent film school graduates
      to seasoned industry professionals have relied on us to help them get the
      information they need to make informed career choices. Our readers include
      employees at the top movie and television studios, cable networks, post
      production houses, major market broadcast stations and leading industry
      associations.</font></p>
      <p>&nbsp;</p>
      <h1><br>
        <br>
      </h1>
      <h1>&nbsp;</h1>
      <p>&nbsp;</p></td>
    <td width="180" valign="top" class="rightcoltext"> <h2><font face="Arial,Helvetica sans-serif" size="2">Career
      Development</font></h2>
      <p><a href="workinproduction.htm" style="color: #0000FF"><font face="Arial,Helvetica Sans-serif" size="2"><span style="mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; color: #0000FF">How
      To Apply For Film or TV Production Jobs</span></font></a></p>
      <p>&nbsp;</p>
      <p><font face="Arial,Helvetica Sans-serif" size="2"><span style="mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt"><a href="interninfilm.htm" style="color: #0000FF">How
      To Get Y</a></span></font><span style="mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt"><font face="Arial,Helvetica Sans-serif" size="2"><a href="interninfilm.htm" style="color: #0000FF">our
      Foot in the Door: An LA Internship</a></font></span></p>
      <p><br>
      <font face="Arial,Helvetica Sans-serif" size="2"><span style="mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt"><a href="art.htm" style="color: #0000FF"><span style="color: #0000FF">How
      To Get</span></a><a href="art.htm" style="color: #0000FF"> Your
      First Job in Entertainment</a></span></font><span style="mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt"><font face="Arial,Helvetica Sans-serif" size="2"><br>
      </font></span></p>
      <p >&nbsp;</p>
      <p class="divider">&nbsp;</p>
      <h2>&nbsp;</h2>
      <h2><font face="Arial,Helvetica sans-serif" size="2">Film Production Crew</font></h2>
      <p class="MsoNormal" style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-LEFT: 0px; TEXT-INDENT: 0px; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1"><font face="Arial" size="2"><b><span style="mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">Leads
      To Films Crewing Up</span></b></font></p>
      <p class="MsoNormal" style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1"><font face="Arial" size="2">Get
      information on what films &amp; TV shows are prepping to shoot and where
      to mail your credits/resume. <i><a href="http://www.entertainmentjobs.com/film_crew.htm">Learn
      more here</a></i>.</font></p>
      <p class="MsoNormal" style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1">&nbsp;</p>
      <p>&nbsp;</p>
      <p class="divider">&nbsp;</p>
      <h2>&nbsp;</h2>
      <h2><font face="Arial,Helvetica sans-serif" size="2">Events Calendar</font></h2>
      <p style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-LEFT: 0px; TEXT-INDENT: 0px; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1"><font face="Arial" size="2"><span style="mso-bidi-font-family: Arial"><b><i>Featured
      Event </i></b></span></font><font size="2"><b><i>November 16 - 18</i></b></font>
      </p>
      <p class="MsoNormal" style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-LEFT: 0px; TEXT-INDENT: 0px; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:
EN-US;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA"><span style="mso-spacerun:yes">&nbsp;</span><span style="color:black">The
      Creative Talent Network Animation Expo</span> presented by the Creative
      Talent Network. Burbank, CA. (800) 604-2238. Website: <a href="http://www.ctnanimationexpo.com">http://www.ctnanimationexpo.com</a></span><span style="mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt"><font face="Arial,Helvetica sans-serif" size="2"><span style="mso-bidi-font-family: Arial; mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt">
      </span>To view more events, <a href="eejcal.htm">click here</a>.<o:p>
      &nbsp;
      </font>
      </span>
      </p>
      <p class="MsoNormal" style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-LEFT: 0px; TEXT-INDENT: 0px; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1"> &nbsp;
